content: extract frames and the frame elements from this sentence: {"sentence": "After both say “no,” the soldier—standing near a small building painted in the Russian flag’s white, blue and red stripes—throws the gun onto the ground with the words “get the fout of here” and gives the gun a couple of kicks, to the delighted guffaws of the guy filming.", "frames": [{"name": "Statement", "elements": [{"name": "Speaker", "text": "both"}, {"name": "Message", "text": "no"}]}, {"name": "Size", "elements": [{"name": "Entity", "text": "building"}]}, {"name": "Buildings", "elements": [{"name": "Descriptor", "text": "small"}, {"name": "Building", "text": "building"}]}, {"name": "Color", "elements": [{"name": "Color", "text": "white"}, {"name": "Entity", "text": "stripes"}]}, {"name": "Color", "elements": [{"name": "Color", "text": "blue"}, {"name": "Entity", "text": "stripes"}]}, {"name": "Color", "elements": [{"name": "Color", "text": "red"}, {"name": "Entity", "text": "stripes"}]}, {"name": "Weapon", "elements": [{"name": "Weapon", "text": "gun"}]}, {"name": "Departing", "elements": [{"name": "Theme", "text": "the f"}, {"name": "Source", "text": "of here"}]}, {"name": "Departing", "elements": [{"name": "Theme", "text": "the f"}, {"name": "Source", "text": "of here"}]}, {"name": "Departing", "elements": [{"name": "Theme", "text": "the f"}, {"name": "Source", "text": "of here"}]}, {"name": "Weapon", "elements": [{"name": "Weapon", "text": "gun"}]}, {"name": "Cardinal\_numbers", "elements": [{"name": "Number", "text": "couple"}, {"name": "Entity", "text": "of kicks"}]}, {"name": "Emotion\_directed", "elements": [{"name": "Experiencer", "text": "guffaws"}]}, {"name": "People", "elements": [{"name": "Person", "text": "guy"}]}]}
